title: Mercury trine Venus
summary: A supportive alignment between thinking and values. Communication flows with consideration and ease, making it simpler to express ideas in ways that resonate. The opportunity is to translate thought into connection without forcing agreement.

meaning.headline: Ideas express themselves with ease.

frames.text: Mercury–Venus trines support communication that reflects both clarity and consideration.
This aspect favors understanding through tone, timing, and shared context.
Conversations tend to feel smoother when values and reasoning align.
Decision-making benefits from reduced friction around preferences.
This guarantees agreement, approval, or positive outcomes.

frictions: Mistaking mutual understanding for full alignment
opportunities: Communicating ideas with clarity and tact

do: Use ease to clarify rather than gloss over details.
Express ideas in ways that respect shared values.
avoid: Avoiding difficult topics because things feel pleasant

reusable_lines.text: Clarity lands best when values are respected.

forbidden_claims: Framing ease as moral or intellectual superiority

sources: Mercury–Venus trine as cognition/value harmony archetype
